summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the functionality of a URL resolver component, covering aspects such as handling of 404 errors with named URLs, resolution of namespaced views, support for nonâ€‘regex patterns, concurrency population, string representation, reverse URL lookup, lazy reverse resolution, and treating view details as callable methods.
business_intent: Ensure the URL resolver works reliably and correctly within the web framework by testing its error handling, namespace support, pattern matching, concurrency behavior, representation, and reverse resolution capabilities.
